reviews.title: Having received some myself last yearâ€¦
reviews.review: Having received some myself last year following an operation, I was so impressed with them, that I decided they were the flowers to send in the future.

reviews.title: Lovely flowers delivered next day
reviews.review: Lovely flowers delivered next day, lasted a week so far, very impressed.

reviews.title: Excellent all round
reviews.review: I have used Bloom & Wild several times now. The website is clear and detailed. The prices are extremely reasonable. Every recipient has adored the selections and all have said the blooms have lasted at least 8-10 days. The concept of letterbox flowers is genius - meaning you never to have ruin a surprise by warning someone they will be receiving a delivery.
